title: 11/30/20 HOUR 3- Maurice Jones Drew
itunes:title: 11/30/20 HOUR 3- Maurice Jones Drew
description:
Maurice Jones Drew tells Dan that he would absolutely pay a running back on their second contract. MJD says that he doesn't know if he would pay a QB big money on his second contract because you can always draft your next QB in the fourth round.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Maurice Jones Drew tells Dan that he would absolutely pay a running back on their second contract. MJD says that he doesn't know if he would pay a QB big money on his second contract because you can always draft your next QB in the fourth round.
